question: Must all PA residents go to Pennie?
text:
Must all PA residents go to Pennie? 
          
        
YES, Pennie is the new Pennsylvania State Based Marketplace (SBM) and will replace Healthcare.gov starting November 1
st
 for plan year 2021. Pennsylvanians applying for marketplace coverage with financial assistance like 
Advance Premium Tax Credits (APTC)
 and 
Cost Sharing Reductions (CSR)
 will need to apply for coverage through Pennie.
